name: Outlaw: Jungle Shootout
description: In 1955 a war between the Independent Republic of Outlaws and the Southeastern Jungle Nation broke out.  You were instructed by the republic to go behind enemy lines for a recon mission. Things went south and now you are stuck.  HQ sent in an armored truck for evac  but you're the lone survivor of a blitz attack and now you must cross a trap infested jungle while avoiding gunfire. Try and survive in a war infested jungle, leaping over traps and dodging gunfire.
